Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iimg::IBitmap::PixelFormat

Bitmap pixel format description.

Enumerator:
PF_UNKNOWN  Unknown image format.
PF_USER  User defined format.
PF_MONO  Monochrome bitmap.
PF_GRAY  8-bit grayscale bitmap.
PF_RGB  32-bit RGB-bitmap, alpha channel can be ignored.
PF_RGBA  32-bit RGB bitmap with alpha channel.
PF_GRAY32  32-bit grayscale bitmap.

Definition at line 21 of file IBitmap.h.

const istd::CIndex2d &  size,
void *  dataPtr,
bool  releaseFlag,
int  linesDifference = 0 
) [pure virtual]

Create bitmap with specified size and format using external image data buffer.

Parameters:
pixelFormat bitmap format.
See also:
PixelFormat
Parameters:
size bitmap size.
dataPtr pointer to external image buffer.
releaseFlag if its true, external buffer will be managed (removed) by this object.
linesDifference address difference between next and previos line. If it equals 0, the value will be taken from size and number of bits per pixel.

Implemented in iimg::CGeneralBitmap, and iqt::CBitmap.
